title: Listen: Senate stalemate on immigration, DACA
text:
Today on AM View:

A look at the next steps for the immigration debate in the Senate with The Hill’s managing editor, Ian Swanson; also, a preview of this weekend’s Power Politics podcast, with guests Rep. Jimmy Pancetta (D-Calif.) and his father, former Defense Secretary Leon Panetta.

ADVERTISEMENT

In separate conversations, the father-son duo from California discussed threats abroad and at home, mammoth national debt projections, and the Democratic Party’s political messaging.

Subscribe now: Apple Podcasts | Soundcloud | Stitcher | Google Play | TuneIn
